text: Kratts' Creatures is a 1996 children's television series. The series was about learning about the world of animals. The series produced a spin-off show called Zoboomafoo due to Kratts' Creatures popularity. Reruns are currently airing on PBS in America. == Cast == *Kratt Brothers (Chris and Martin Kratt) *Alison Baldwin - Shannon Duff *Ttark - voiced by Ron Rubin ==Other websites== *Kratts' Creatures on PBS Kids GO * Category:1996 American television series debuts Category:1996 American television series endings Category:1990s American television series Category:1996 Canadian television series debuts Category:1996 Canadian television series endings Category:American children's television series Category:Canadian children's television series Category:Television series about animals
title: Kratts' Creatures
